data.description:
# Learn how to draw with Pencil!
Pencil! is a fun new way to learn how to draw! Overlay drawing guides on your physical paper to help you trace and follow along. By combining mixed-reality with a sheet of paper & a pencil, grow your art skills from complete beginner to master artist! 

![{"height":400,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974794_796057045987513_2008024649165496928_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gAY515DDsisQ7kNvgGwMoaG&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCIfrNxJFdpYM4b8qH27add4GBi3LJsUykLN641xY479g&oe=66ED6719)
Be sure to join our **Discord** to share your art with the community and give us feedback: https://discord.gg/GpabPFTzDy
![{"height":300,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974833_464353966336396_6750467216746059287_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LnQOn5nE30EQ7kNvgEQXm2Z&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBILCBCbHHTb99Xup2ODYfwi9_m_2B00OJ8Jlg1rECtOg&oe=66ED3C60)
![{"height":200,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974631_926346679181546_3231541265199675309_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=KLhn_dvY540Q7kNvgFNsQvS&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBYRvIYxegmTWX3S78zWvaAeTtHeOev-g0ebqCbBdvYZw&oe=66ED6F4F)
Pencil! teaches you how to draw by overlaying step-by-step guides on your piece of paper.
Learn fundamental concepts such as:
- Shape & Form
- Perspective
- Texture
- Anatomy
- & More!

![{"height":200,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974833_870538868428823_1173830424327919644_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=5vmWxL0Y5zgQ7kNvgFT-BUC&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDJWf3l3gBEhiOy12DJwISzqx48URxcLnlpWE_3E9G7Ow&oe=66ED3A16)
Create your own still-life composition with Free-draw mode. Drag and drop 3d and 2d models onto a stage that get projected onto your paper.

changelog.change_log: Fixed the "follow controller" checkbox in the settings panel.

Fixes for 3d free draw lighting
Fixed grabbing objects in free draw with the right controller
Fixed height adjustment often not working

Cleaned up provided content in 2d Free Draw
Improved loading of 2d free draw assets, both built in art and art from the user's device. 
More plant models
Support for loading .jpeg files from Documents and Downloads (in addition to already supported .jpg and .png)

New Lessons:
 Banana
 Grapes
 Strawberry
